general.gigTitle: develop wordpress website design and responsive web design

sellerCard.oneLiner: WordPress, WooCommerce, PHP, Custom Plugin Developer!
sellerCard.description: Hi, it's Adil Farid, a professional web developer and WordPress specialist. I've been working with WordPress since 2021 and have worked with over 1,000+ international clients from various countries, as well as more than 3,000+ local and international clients. I specialize in WordPress Bug Fixing, WordPress Speed Optimization, WordPress Website Design, WordPress Security, Migration, Cloning, Plugin or Theme Development etc. If you are looking for a well experienced WordPress Developer then you have opened one of the best Developer Profile. Thank you!

description.content:
PROFESSIONAL WORDPRESS WEBSITE DESIGN FOR YOUR BUSINESS --


It's ADIL FARID, Senior Web Designer and Developer. I focus on listening, understanding your requirements and addressing your needs to provide a truly unique, beautiful, engaging and impactful WordPress website design for your business. I've designed 1k+ websites so far. I am a Fullstack WordPress Developer and have great experience in Custom Plugin & Theme Development.


What type of WordPress site I develop:


  • Company/Business
  • Personal Blog
  • E-commerce
  • Service site
  • Portfolio etc


Gig Key Features:


  • Highly Professional and Eye-catching WordPress Website Design
  • Fully Responsive design
  • All browsers compatible
  • Free SSL installation ( Security )
  • SEO Friendly
  • Speed optimized ( 90+ Score with Instant Loading & A Grade )
  • Register your website on Google Search Engine
  • E-commerce Functionality
  • Social media integration
  • Content uploaded
  • Contact forms, Google map
  • Easy to edit with Page Builder
  • And much more


Why Choose Me?


  • Ô∏èSuccessfuly completed 1000+ orders
  • In-depth knowledge
  • Well Experienced Developer
  • Revisions Until You're Satisfied
  • Friendly Support


I'M LOOKING FORWARD TO HEARING FROM YOU ... THANKS :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: How much time is generally required to design and develop a WordPress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: The timeline varies based on the project's complexity, customization requirements, and content volume. Typically, a straightforward WordPress website can be designed and developed within a few days, whereas more extensive projects may take several weeks.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to start working on my WordPress website project?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: To get started, I‚Äôll need your project requirements, content, and any specific design preferences you have.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you build the website 100% mobile friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will build the website 100% responsive for all devices. You don't need to worry about that :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you provide me 100% client satisfaction?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I will provide revisions until you are satisfied with the final delivery.

packageList.title: BASIC SETUP
